title: I cant play ranked
body: So i recently hit level 30 after a long time of playing the game. i enjoy it a lot and was looking forward to playing ranked with some buddies from my school. Although it wont allow me to select ranked but i can select ranked for 3v3. Im a confused because im able to play draft which i though had the same requirements as ranked. Is there something here i am missing?

replies.body: Congrats on 30!  You might not have enough champions in your pool for Ranked yet.  You'll need to get 20 champs under your belt, then you should be able to join your friends in Ranked.  Good luck!
You need a minimum of 20 BOUGHT champs, you usually don't have them when you hit 30
